EmailTemplate.name: Final Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Deadline Today - your response needed â€“ {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Deadline day is today, {!Opportunity.ACDF_Deadline__c}, to complete your candidate form for the {!Opportunity.Award_Area__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} {!Opportunity.Program_Name__c} award.
Reminder: You do not have to purchase anything to be part of the designation. All award winners receive a complimentary listing of their name and company name on the Five Star Professional website, www.fivestarprofessional.com. There is no obligation to make a purchase to be considered for, or to be named an award winner.
Please let me know if there are any questions I can answer.
Candidate Evaluation Form - Click Here to Complete
Kind Regards,
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2117 Cliff Dr Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: {!User.Phone} Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
Reminder: Third party firms may have contacted you suggesting you are an award winner and offering you wall plaques or other products. These firms are in no way affiliated with Five Star Professional.
Only Five Star Professional can name you a Five Star award winner and provide official award-related products and services. Marketing organizations not affiliated with Five Star Professional do not comply with industry regulatory requirements and may be violating trademarks or copyrights.
unsubscribe from this list
Or you can reply back, STOP, to this email to unsubscribe
